name: Ant March
description:
Description

Work with your colony to collect food, but be quick! The food doesn't last long...

Food can be very heavy! One ant can't lift it all, but working together...

Recruit other ants and clear the map of food for your colony!

Controls

WASD or Left Mouse to move

That's it!

Goal

Collect all the food on the map and bring it back to your anthill!

The Ants That Made This!

Jimmy - Project Manager, 3D Artist

Joseph - Gameplay Programmer, Sound, 3D Artist

Rui - Gameplay Programmer, Effects, UI Design

Stephen - Gameplay Programmer, Textures

Credits

"Wash Your Hand" Font by Syafrizal a.k.a. Khurasan - https://www.dafont.com/wash-your-hand.font
